Title: A Hunter's Trap
Description:
By now, most hunters would have been trained in the art of trapping. Allow me to get you up to speed.

We'll start with a freezing trap. In order to make one, you'll have to forage materials from your surroundings.

Meredy can provide you with a mote of ice. Scavenge the area for the rest of what is required.

And don't delay. You will need that freezing trap to deal with a problem that has cropped up within the camp.
ObjectivesText: Scavenge parts in the area to create a Freezing Trap.
CompletionText: Did you get the supplies needed? Meredy should have the ice mote, while the other two should be nearby.
RewardText:
With a little work, this can become a trap you can use. 

Part of being a hunter means making use of what your surroundings provide.

Objectives.Text: Ice mote received from Meredy Huntswell
